title: Particle Physics for Fife
abstractText:
On the occasion of the Scottish Universities Summer School in Physics "LHC Physics", 
- to engage school groups and the general public from rural areas around Fife, Perthshire and Kinross, with LHC science:
 -- stimulating their interest in LHC physics and technology, 
 -- deepening their understanding of the physics beyond what is reported in the popular press,
 -- raising their awareness of the spinoffs and effects of the research on everyday life, and 
 -- emphasizing the role that Scottish and other UK STFC researchers play in the LHC projects.
